# ContractRoyalty.getTokenRoyaltyInfo() method

Get the royalty recipient and fee of a particular token

## Example

```javascript
const royaltyInfo = await contract.royalties.getDefaultRoyaltyInfo();
console.log(royaltyInfo.fee_recipient);
console.log(royaltyInfo.seller_fee_basis_points);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTokenRoyaltyInfo(tokenId: BigNumberish): Promise<{
        seller_fee_basis_points: number;
        fee_recipient: string;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description |
| --------- | ------------ | ----------- |
| tokenId   | BigNumberish |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ seller_fee_basis_points: number; fee_recipient: string; }&gt;

- The royalty recipient and BPS
